duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute tactical design projects and implement text/content changes for production.
Communicate with creative, account, and project managers to evaluate and prioritize requests.
Evaluate and clean up files for consistency across multiple pieces and projects.
Provide technical support to the design team by editing and preparing files that meet graphic standards.
Prepare artwork for production, including scaling images, adjusting resolution, and creating packaging schematics.
Retouch images in Photoshop and apply special effects to photography.
Add interactive functionality to PDFs and provide project and printing specifications.
Perform artwork searches, create presentations, and work overtime when needed to complete time-sensitive projects.
Provide samples of work, including before-and-after retouched photos.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in design or related discipline (Master's preferred)
